The owner of this establishment is very rude. I was doing laundry next door to his restaurant, which I had planned on patronizing after I finish doing laundry. I was parked in a public parking lot behind the restaurant, where the owner pulled up and parked on my bumper twice and was doing deliveries to his restaurant. I asked him ‚Äúwhy do you continue blocking me in?‚Äù His response was its his restaurant and do what he wants and park where he wants. I moved my truck and gave him the parking space, if the parking lot is free for the public to park as long as they patronizing the local businesses, I don‚Äôt understand why the owner of this restaurant thinks it‚Äôs ok to bully ppl out of the parking space just because it‚Äôs in front of his restaurant. I will not patronize this business just off his attitude. The pictures below is the picture of the restaurant as well as the truck that‚Äôs was parked on my bumperüò°
